get_all_assets_cdn.name: get_all_assets_cdn
get_all_assets_cdn.description: This tool retrieves published assets from Contentstack's CDN (Content Delivery Network). It returns only the assets that are published and publicly accessible. Use this for faster asset retrieval in delivery/production environments.

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

environment.description: Select an environment to fetch the asset details published in that environment.

locale.description: Select a locale to fetch the asset details published in a particular locale.

version.description: Specify the asset version to be retrieved.

get_all_entries_cdn.name: get_all_entries_cdn
get_all_entries_cdn.description: Retrieves published entries from a specific content type via CDN. Returns only published entries that are publicly accessible, optimized for delivery environments.

content_type_name.description: Specify the content type uid to fetch entries from

environment.description: Specify the environment name to fetch published entries from

skip.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination

locale.description: Specify the locale to fetch localized entries

include.description: Referenced fields to include in the response

include_count.description: Include total count of entries in response

include_fallback.description: Include fallback locale content if specified locale not available

get_a_single_asset_cdn.name: get_a_single_asset_cdn
get_a_single_asset_cdn.description: Retrieves a single published asset from CDN. Returns the asset details that are publicly accessible, optimized for delivery environments.

environment.description: Specify the environment name to fetch the published asset from

asset_id.description: Specify the asset uid to fetch its details

get_a_single_entry_cdn.name: get_a_single_entry_cdn
get_a_single_entry_cdn.description: Retrieves a single published entry from CDN. Returns the entry details that are publicly accessible, optimized for delivery environments.

content_type_name.description: Specify the content type uid to fetch the entry from

entry_id.description: Specify the entry uid to fetch its details

environment.description: Specify the environment name to fetch the published entry from

locale.description: Specify the locale to fetch localized entry

include.description: Referenced fields to include in the response

include_fallback.description: Include fallback locale content if specified locale not available
